A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Besides Finn and Rose this movie is really good. Every sense I liked was great\, every sense I didn’t like was really boring or it didn’t feel like Star Wars\, for example the Finn and Rose sense reminded me of Harry Potter. The action is tense\, the cinematography is great and the acting is really good\, especially Adam Driver. The only problem with the movie is that it’s to long. I feel that if the Finn and Rose stuff was cut and they changed the sense completely\, it would be the best movie of the year. In all those are my opinions
